alert.note: Alert for Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 2:03PM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Periods of snow, heavy at times. Snowfall accumulations of 2 to 4 inches near Jackson; 6 to 8 inches near Teton village and Wilson. Up to 5 inches near Daniel. Total snow accumulations of 8 to 12 inches, with locally higher amounts to 15 inches. Winds gusting 35 to 45 mph through this afternoon. * WHERE...Jackson Hole, Star Valley and Upper Green River Basin Foothills. * WHEN...Until 11 PM Thursday. Moderate snow will again break out after midnight tonight, with heavy snow possible Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a tenth of mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.

area.areaDesc: Jackson Hole; Star Valley; Upper Green River Basin Foothills
